definition: to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: It's cheaper than to bring the partners here.
sentences.chinese: 這比帶陪練過來要便宜得多。
提供代駕司機或陪練司機。

sentences.english: He ean have been delayed by fog.
sentences.chinese: 他可能被大霧外教口語陪練所耽誤了。

sentences.english: Could you tell me how to go to the platform?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我到月臺外教口語陪練怎麼走嗎？

sentences.english: "They need to go where the partners are," Gheorghe said.
sentences.chinese: “她們需要找有陪練的地方，”喬戈說。

sentences.english: How much does the ticket to London cost?
sentences.chinese: 去倫敦的火車票票外教口語陪練價多少？

sentences.english: Ask your training partners if you don't know.
sentences.chinese: 問你的陪練如果你還不知道。

definition: the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: at leisure/idle/to have nothing to do
unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
(Tw) excuse me/to be sorry/(Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [pháinn-sè]
first-rate/excellent (loanword from Japanese 一番, ichiban)
to move one's base (of operations)/to reposition/to relocate
